text:
If you were given the malaria drugs Plaquenil (#hydroxychloroquine ) or Aralen (#chloroquine) for treatment of #coronavirus, you should be aware of these potential side effects, including eye problem: https://t.co/5C00Q5spoj
Follow us for more #eyehealth #tips.
#eyecareforall https://t.co/NNkGL5rILC
